name: Lost Stuff
description:
Alli is lost. And all the stuff around her is disappearing.  You might try to find it. Just be careful or you'll... well, get lost yourself. LOST STUFF DELIVERS:

* A disturbing and visually vibrant hidden object story

* About 10 minutes of playthrough (but oh boy are they intense)

* Lots of illustrations in a pretty random pink/black color scheme with 'hearth beating' animation style

* A funky rhythmic music you're gonna love!

* A considerable level of polish the developer couldn't resist deliver due to her obsessive compulsive obsession for details (that's promising at least)

JUST PLAY AND GET LOST! (ER I MEAN, ENJOY!)

@nadiaorenes

nadiaorenes.es
